description: This Dart source file defines the NoteDetailScreen widget, which displays detailed information about a single note, and provides functionalities to edit or delete the note within a Flutter application.

classes.name: NoteDetailScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that shows the details of a specific note identified by noteId.

classes.name: _NoteDetailScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and logic for the NoteDetailScreen, including loading, editing, and deleting notes.

methods.name: _loadNote
methods.description: Loads the note with the specified noteId from the NotesService.

methods.name: _onEdit
methods.description: Navigates to the NoteEditScreen for editing the current note, and reloads the note if changes were made.

methods.name: _onDelete
methods.description: Prompts the user for confirmation and deletes the note if confirmed, then navigates back.
